sentences.english: We must also discover "others" and the intersubjective world.
sentences.chinese: 我們必鬚髮現“他者”和主體間性的世界。

sentences.english: But this witness must come from a heart that is willing to give without getting anything in return.
sentences.chinese: 但是見證者必鬚髮自內心的只求付出不求回報。

sentences.english: We must exploit tactical surprise to the maxima.
sentences.chinese: 我們必鬚髮揮戰術的奇襲效果到極致。

sentences.english: To avoid monotony, we must always find something fresh, new.
sentences.chinese: 爲了避免千篇一律，我們必鬚髮掘新意。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese medicine Polygonum multiflorum has the function of hair blacking .
sentences.chinese: 傳統中藥何首烏具有烏鬚髮的作用。

sentences.english: Make great vows, to benefit all sentient beings.
sentences.chinese: 發願必鬚髮利益衆生的大願。

sentences.english: It must arouse and develop the artist in them.
sentences.chinese: 它必鬚髮掘和培養他們的藝術修養。

sentences.english: An actor has to enunciate clearly.
sentences.chinese: 演員必鬚髮音吐詞清楚。

sentences.english: CHERNOFF: The parents have to play a key role.
sentences.chinese: 家長必鬚髮揮關鍵作用。

sentences.english: We must increase the potentialities of recycling used materials.
sentences.chinese: 我們必鬚髮揮廢物循壞利用的潛力。

sentences.english: And thou shalt take thereof a small number: and shalt bind them in the skirt of thy cloak.
sentences.chinese: 但你要從鬚髮中取出幾根來，系在你的衣服邊上。

sentences.english: To access conversations, the Fisa court had to issue a specific order.
sentences.chinese: 要獲取通話內容，Fisa法庭必鬚髮出專門指令。

sentences.english: Her lips so big, Chap Stick had to invent a spray.
sentences.chinese: 她嘴脣這麼大，抹凍瘡膏必鬚髮明噴射裝置。

sentences.english: In estimate and practical construction, the testing fee should be a must.
sentences.chinese: 工程試驗費是工程概預算和實際施工必鬚髮生的費用。

definition: to polish a text/rhetoric/ornate language/to use florid language to conceal errors/to gloss over
sinuous/meandering/to take a circuitous route/to toss about/vicissitudes/variant of 婉轉|婉转[wan3 zhuan3]
Jiguan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
Silkworms in Spring (1933), Chinese silent movie in socialist realist style, based on novel by Mao Dun 茅盾[Mao2 Dun4]
